title: Cant login
body:
I login here perfectly on site but when I enter the game it says that username or password are incorrect but it all fine written I check many times but still,...
P.S. when I was playing power went off so my computer shut down 
thank you for listening!

replies.body: If you're able to login here, but the client says your info is wrong, I'm wondering if it's possible that you're trying to login to the wrong server. Make sure you've got EUNE selected, and if so take a screenshot so I can see what's going on.

Oh you are right, when power went off it reset all but when I clicked north america it shows the language English when I click north america again it show me Brazil Russia and others but I did not  know that you can scroll down Im really sorry for interrupt thank you so much i entered the game now 
I look like a fool now.
thank you! :D
